name: Teriyaki Rice Bowl
description: Dine in tonight with our restaurant version of a warm Teriyaki rice bowl. It is perfectly balanced and will quickly become one of your go-to recipes.
preparation: Place 2 tbsp of teryaiki sauce, oil and chicken in a wok or frying pan over medium high heat. Cook for 3-4 minutes. Once cooked set aside.
Add veggies and remaining teriyaki sauce in wok and stir-fry 2-3 minutes
Place warm rice into a serving bowl.
Top with Salt and Pepper as desire
tips: Flavour rice with your favourite broth mix prior to cooking.

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
